reviews.text: 5 stars for the mac n cheese but 1 star because I've called probably 7 different times lately and not once have I been able to reach them. It just rings and rings and they never pick up anymore. Not sure why. I know they're still open during the pandemic/shutdown because I see their drivers all around the city. Disappointing to say the least üëéüèªüëéüèª

I order the chicken kabob pizza with a side of the house dressing to dip my crust. I could literally eat this every day of my life. 

I know that sounds cliche but I'm someone who doesn't eat pizza...ever. I nearly starved as a child at birthday parties watching other kids eat pizza and as a hungover college student.

This is Italian style pizza. It reminds me of TC Landos (978 represent) back in the day when the family ran the shops and the pizza was authentic. 

Oh and their curly fries are out of this world!

Hell yea for thin crust pizza outside of the city. If you're looking for a go-to place, don't pass up Reach for the Pie!

This place has some great food. A few friends brought me for a chicken sandwich here and since that time have been stopping by. Definitely a good place to eat, highly recommend to anyone. Maybe the best chicken sandwiches around.
We got the meat lovers pizza with no sausage and we added tomato and onion. It was amazing ! One of the best pizzas I‚Äôve had in a while. We really liked the thin crust
My favorite place for pizza ! The staff is also amazing! If I could rate this gem 10 stars I would ! So yummy !!!
